resources.string:
Welcome to Little Plant Thoughts! 
 
 Your plant wants to talk to you, and it can through this helpful app! Stick your sensor in your plant's soil, close to a root, and check the screen for daily chapter updates. 
 
 To play through a chapter, tap the chapter button to start, and tap the triangle button to advance through the chapter. You can always play old chapters again. 
 
 Made by The Strict Parents for PennApps XX.
